name: The Race to the Sunset
description: As you already know, my game is called race to the sunset. to play my game you use the arrow keys, to move up, press the up arrow key. To move left, press the left arrow key. To move right, press the right arrow key. To move down, press the down arrow key. But, beware of the evil mayor of Sunsetville, he will kill anyone who touches him.The mayor wears a black top hat and is red. to get rid of him you have a hammer, you will get rid of everyone of him (there is a lot). you have a shield so that if you do run into him you wont loose a life. have fun playing
